Package it.polimi.se2.meteocal.beans

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEventBean
    Abstract representation of the bean that takes care of the event form actions, containing common methods for both creation and update of events
    CalendarBean
    Bean that takes care of the calendar management, allowing to load the calendar table and update the event list for the selected day
    LoginBean
    Bean that manages the log-in and log-out functions with user-name and password verification
    NewEventBean
    Bean for the new event creation form, extending the functions of the AbstractEventBean
    NotificationBean
    Bean that takes care of the notification management, with methods to generate the list of notification and callbacks to perform actions
    RegistrationBean
    Bean that provides registration functions: user data verification and creation
    UpdateEventBean
    Bean for the existing event update, extending the functions of the AbstractEventBean
    UserBean
    Bean that provides information about the user currently logged into the system
    UserConverter
    Generic converter for the invitation pickList during event creation
